rows.label: tlk44200185_02_msg0001
rows.name:
We're now able to order books
from abroad, so I went and asked
my mum first thing!

rows.label: tlk44200185_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I got this one from Avaritia,
called "The Millenarian Divine Beast".

rows.label: tlk44200185_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It's an epic story following one Divine Beast
over the course of its very long life.

rows.label: tlk44200185_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm dying to know what happens next,
but I'm making myself read only one
page per day. That way it'll last me!
